attributes.action: Stop England Football Games being shown on subscription based tv. (Friendlies, Euro Qualifiers, World Cup.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a petition to allow all England football matches to be available to normal terrestrial channels. No pay to view package should be needed (SKY, NTL Etc).

We should not have to pay Sky or other companies our money to watch our home nation compete.

Any game whether it is a Friendly, Euro Qualifier, World Cup Qualifier or any of the Tournaments should be available to anyone able to receive terrestrial television.

I for one cant afford the subscriptions that are needed to watch football and im sure many others cant either.

Lets get together and try to stop this now.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
